attributes.action: Require BBC news coverage at comparable level for European and UK Parliaments
attributes.background: People should learn more about the work and behaviour of MEPs, especially considering the current social division regarding the so-called "Brexit".

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for the BBC. The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is editorially independent of government and the Government cannot intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations. 

You can contact the BBC here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/contact
